name: Mundomagico
description:
Mundomagico is a prototype for a puzzle platformer with asymmetrical cooperative gameplay where the ladybug character helps the kid character get through single screen stages through the manipulation of background elements within the stage.

CONTROLS (Kid character)

- Arrow key: Move

- hold Z key: Distract enemy (Both characters need to be facing each other for it to work)

CONTROLS (Ladybug character)

- Mouse: Movement

- Hold left click: Pick up leaves.

- W and S: Change picked object's size

- A and D: Rotate picked object
